title: Third-grade teacher learns handshakes for each student
text:
Third-grade teacher learns handshakes for each student USA TODAY 11:01 a.m. ET Feb. 21, 2017 CLOSE x Share When Molly Gray saw a viral video of a teacher and his students’ special handshakes, she thought she could do the same with her students. HUMANKIND Teacher Molly Gray and one of her third-grade students carry out a unique handshake. (Photo: Courtesy Molly Gray) CONNECT COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
EVANSVILLE, IN -- When Molly Gray saw a viral video of a teacher and his students’ special handshakes , she thought she could do the same with her students. 
Gray worked with each of her third-grade students and everyone had memorized their handshakes by the end of the day. They then decided to tape the continuous stream of handshakes and put it up on Facebook. 
According to Gray, the dynamic between teacher and student has changed in education. Teachers have to try, “different things to get [students] excited and feel welcome and build those relationships.” 
Her students’ excitement has been long-lasting. They’ve continued their special handshakes since recording this video.
